data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Cádiz to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Cádiz, Andalucía, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 19,705 believers in Cádiz to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 62 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Cádiz, Andalucía, Spain.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Cádiz who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the South Asian, general people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
God, we pray for the believers in Cádiz, Andalucía, Spain to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Cádiz, Andalucía, Spain a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Cádiz who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
